targetLine.text: Weren’t you just in the news? Some show in Prayge...Prague?

contextBefore.text: Yes, things are going quite well. Quite well. My God, no complaints. But, you know, it is not the same. Not the same at all.

contextAfter.text: Milan, darling. Milan. Supermodels. Ha! Nothing super about them. Spoiled, stupid, little stick figures with poofy lips who think only about themselves. Feh! I used to design for gods.... but perhaps you come with a challenge, eh? I was surprised to get your call.
E, I just need a patch job.
Hmm. This is megamesh. Outmoded, but very sturdy. And you’ve torn right through it ! What have you been doing , Robert? Moonlighting hero work?
